buttons.openNoteHint: Open a Markdown note to use Improve, Expand, and other tools

amendModal.title: Amend Note
amendModal.placeholder: Enter amend instructions (e.g., add examples, refine definition, add related theories)

recentOps.title: Operation History
recentOps.clearAllConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all snapshots? This action cannot be undone.

notifications.openMarkdownFirst: Please open a Markdown note first
notifications.selectDuplicates: Please select duplicates to merge first
notifications.confirmCreateWaiting: Creation confirmed, waiting for content generation
notifications.undoDismissSuccess: Dismiss undone, duplicate pair restored to pending list
notifications.mergeStarted: Merge task started. Please wait for AI to finish.
notifications.improveStarted: Improvement task started. Please wait for AI to finish.
notifications.verifyStarted: Verification started. Please wait for AI to finish.
notifications.workbenchNotInitialized: Workbench not initialized, please try again later
notifications.pendingDuplicatesHint: There are {count} pending duplicates. Please select which to merge in the workbench.
notifications.conceptLocked: This concept is currently being processed. Please try again later.

expand.looseStructureHint: No standard sections found. Fallback scan may miss items.
expand.abstractInstruction: Pick at least one similar concept to generate a more abstract one with the current note.

similarityThreshold.name: Similarity Threshold
similarityThreshold.desc: Similarity threshold for detecting duplicate concepts (0-1)

maxSnapshots.name: Max Snapshots
maxSnapshots.desc: Maximum number of snapshots for undo operations

maxSnapshotAgeDays.name: Snapshot Retention Days
maxSnapshotAgeDays.desc: Snapshots older than this will be automatically cleaned up

provider.title: AI Provider Configuration
provider.addDesc: Configure AI service provider (supports OpenAI standard format, compatible with other services via custom endpoint)
provider.noProvider: No provider configured yet. Please add at least one provider to use plugin features.
provider.addFirstProvider: Click the button above to add your first AI Provider

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.exportDesc: Export current configuration as JSON file
importExport.resetDesc: Reset all settings to default values

namingTemplate.name: Naming Template
namingTemplate.desc: Note filename template. Supported placeholders: {{chinese}} (Chinese name), {{english}} (English name), {{type}} (type in English), {{type_cn}} (type in Chinese), {{uid}} (unique identifier)

directoryScheme.title: Directory Scheme
directoryScheme.desc: Configure storage directory for each knowledge type

taskModels.title: Task Model Configuration
taskModels.desc: Configure models and parameters for different task types

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.desc: Controls randomness of generated content (0-2), lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative

topP.name: Top P
topP.desc: Nucleus sampling parameter (0-1), controls diversity of generated content

reasoningEffort.name: Reasoning Effort
reasoningEffort.desc: Reasoning intensity (for models that support reasoning, such as o1, o3)

embedding.title: Embedding Parameters
embedding.dimensionWarning: Changing dimension requires rebuilding vector index, existing vector data will be invalidated

features.title: Feature Toggles
features.enableAutoVerifyDesc: Run Verify after writing and append a report to the end of the note (adds one LLM call)

queue.title: Queue Parameters
queue.maxRetryAttemptsDesc: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed tasks
queue.taskTimeoutDesc: Maximum execution time for a single task (milliseconds, default 180000 = 3 minutes)
queue.maxTaskHistoryDesc: Maximum number of completed/failed/cancelled tasks to retain (default 300)
queue.providerTimeoutDesc: Timeout for API requests (milliseconds, default 1800000 = 30 minutes)

welcome.title: Welcome to Cognitive Razor
welcome.subtitle: Turn ideas into structured concepts and evolve your knowledge graph.
welcome.featureDefineTagWrite: Define -> Tag -> Write: full creation pipeline

provider.title: Configure AI Provider
provider.customEndpointDesc: Leave empty to use Gemini OpenAI-compatible endpoint

directory.title: Initialize directories
directory.subtitle: Create directory structure for the 5 concept types.

complete.title: Setup complete
complete.subtitle: Cognitive Razor is ready. Open the Workbench to get started.

validation.offlineSaved: Network unavailable, config saved, you can continue
validation.offlineSavedByError: Network error, config saved, you can continue

providerConfig.description: Configure an OpenAI-compatible API service (Gemini, OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, etc.).

fields.endpointDesc: Leave empty to use the default Gemini endpoint.
fields.embedModelDesc: Used for vector embedding and semantic search

errors.invalidUrlProtocol: URL must start with http:// or https://

notices.logLevelChanged: Log level set to: {level} (will take effect on next startup)

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.message: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{id}"? This action cannot be undone.

resetSettings.title: Reset Settings
resetSettings.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.

deleteDuplicatePair.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDuplicatePair.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this duplicate pair record? This action cannot be undone.

define.name: Define
define.desc: Normalize the input and determine the concept type

write.name: Write
write.desc: Generate full content or merge results

verify.name: Verify
verify.desc: Check the accuracy of generated content

image-generate.name: Image
image-generate.desc: Generate images and insert into notes

crTypeDirectories.Domain: Storage directory for knowledge domains. Default: 1-领域, supports relative paths like CR/1-领域
crTypeDirectories.Issue: Storage directory for issues. Default: 2-议题, supports relative paths like CR/2-议题
crTypeDirectories.Theory: Storage directory for theories. Default: 3-理论, supports relative paths like CR/3-理论
crTypeDirectories.Entity: Storage directory for entities. Default: 4-实体, supports relative paths like CR/4-实体
crTypeDirectories.Mechanism: Storage directory for mechanisms. Default: 5-机制, supports relative paths like CR/5-机制

taskModels.title: Task Model Configuration
taskModels.resetAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all task configurations to default values? This action cannot be undone.
taskModels.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this task configuration to default values?

fields.providerDesc: Select AI Provider (leave empty to use default Provider)
fields.modelDesc: Specify the model to use (e.g., gemini-3-flash-preview)
fields.temperatureDesc: Controls randomness (0-2), lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative
fields.maxTokensDesc: Limit output tokens (leave empty for no limit)
fields.reasoningEffortDesc: For models that support reasoning (e.g., o1, o3)

define.name: Define
define.desc: Analyze and define core concept meaning

index.name: Index
index.desc: Generate semantic vectors and build index

image-generate.name: Image
image-generate.desc: Generate images and insert into notes

validation.topP: Top P must be between 0 and 1
validation.maxTokens: Max output tokens must be a positive integer

enabled.name: Enable image generation
enabled.desc: Allow inserting AI-generated images into notes

defaultSize.name: Default image size
defaultSize.desc: Default canvas size when generating images

defaultQuality.name: Image quality
defaultQuality.desc: standard: standard quality, hd: high quality (costs more tokens)

defaultAspectRatio.name: Aspect ratio
defaultAspectRatio.desc: Deprecated. No longer used for image generation; use "Default image size" instead.

defaultImageSize.name: Output resolution
defaultImageSize.desc: Deprecated. No longer used for image generation; use "Default image size" instead.

contextWindowSize.name: Context window size
contextWindowSize.desc: Characters before/after cursor to include in prompt

imageModal.title: Generate Image
imageModal.promptPlaceholder: Example: A clean line-art diagram showing quantum entanglement with concise labels.
imageModal.genericFailure: Operation failed, please try again later

feedback.defaultError: Operation failed, please try again later
